Description.Neutral:
ENTER THE SNAKEPIT

(Campaign - Firefight Arena)

Built initially in 2551 to train the next generation of Spartans, this remote base sports a cutting-edge holographic battle simulation system. It briefly boosted UNSC recruitment before training resources were reallocated after the conflict on Reach.

Fight through arcade-style waves of classic Halo enemies in a small arena. Survive, and be rewarded.
